summary: *Contagion* is a thrilling movie about a dangerous virus spreading quickly around the world. Directed by Steven Soderbergh, it stars many famous actors like Matt Damon and Kate Winslet. The story shows how doctors and scientists try to find a cure while people struggle to survive. It's like reading a book with many stories connected together. The film is based on real events, such as the SARS and flu pandemics. It was made popular again in 2020 because of the COVID-19 outbreak.
title: Contagion (2011 film)
